name: Grapply Grapple
description:
rules are simple make sure ball or you don't fall of the platform. platform moves to place with more weight on it so make sure platform is stable. the difficult part is that you can move only using grappling hooks. The game is difficult so that's how I see the amount of scores:

Left Click to grapple on grappling spheres and ball it's self.

Left Click anywhere to dash if you got enough speed.

make sure ball stays on platform for as long as possible.

(I had challenge to create game with grappling hooks so here it is)

Grapply Grapple 0.2:

Player character is faster

ball is slower

Player sliding on start of game glitch has been removed

Icon has been added
